name: Sounds of Death
description:
FIND ALL 6 KEYS AND ESCAPE
AND DO NOT MAKE A SOUND! Controls (PC/Controller):

WASD/L-Stick = Movement
Mouse/R-Stick = Look
E/Left Button (X) = Interact
Esc/Option = Pause

This game requires a microphone, make sure it's set as default under the Windows settings.

This game was made as a student project at SAE Qantm Melbourne.
